languages.text: "Думаешь, они — слепые? Они видят куда больше тебя. В отражениях зеркал, благословленных энергиями {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериума{/g}, Предел рассвета открывает им картины истинного бытия, дарует видения грядущего. Глаза врут — наши бывшие хозяева научили их видеть лишь то, что соответствует их лжи. Мы дарим истинное видение".

traits.locale_text: "Думаешь, они — слепые? Они видят куда больше тебя. В отражениях зеркал, благословленных энергиями {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериума{/g}, Предел рассвета открывает им картины истинного бытия, дарует видения грядущего. Глаза врут — наши бывшие хозяева научили их видеть лишь то, что соответствует их лжи. Мы дарим истинное видение".

languages.text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them glimpses of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."
languages.original_text: "Думаешь, они — слепые? Они видят куда больше тебя. В отражениях зеркал, благословленных энергиями {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериума{/g}, Предел рассвета открывает им картины истинного бытия, дарует видения грядущего. Глаза врут — наши бывшие хозяева научили их видеть лишь то, что соответствует их лжи. Мы дарим истинное видение".

traits.locale_text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them gleams of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile owners had taught them to see only what was consistent with the lies they told. The gift we give is that of true vision."

The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."

languages.text: "Ihr haltet sie für blind? Sie sehen sehr viel mehr als Ihr. Durch Reflexionen in Spiegeln, die von den Energien des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immateriums{/g} gesegnet wurden, zeigt der Rand des Tagesanbruchs ihnen Visionen der wahren Existenz. Und er gewährt ihnen einen Blick auf das Kommende. Die Augen lügen: Unsere einstigen Meister hatten ihnen beigebracht, nur das zu sehen, was mit ihren Lügen übereinstimmt. Unser Geschenk ist das der wahren Sicht."
languages.original_text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them glimpses of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr haltet sie für blind? Sie sehen sehr viel mehr als Ihr. Durch Reflexionen in Spiegeln, die von den Energien des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immateriums{/g} gesegnet wurden, zeigt der Rand des Tagesanbruchs ihnen Visionen der wahren Existenz. Und er gewährt ihnen einen Blick auf das Kommende. Die Augen lügen: Unsere einstigen Besitzer hatten ihnen beigebracht, nur das zu sehen, was mit ihren Lügen übereinstimmt. Unser Geschenk ist das der wahren Sicht."

languages.text: « Les croyez-vous aveugles ? Ils voient plus loin que vous. À travers les reflets de miroirs bénis par les énergies de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, la Lame de l'Aube leur révèle des visions d'une véritable existence et leur donne un aperçu de ce qui adviendra. Les yeux mentent... Nos anciens maîtres leur ont appris à ne voir que ce qui correspond aux mensonges dont ils nous abreuvent. Le don que nous leur faisons est celui de la vision véritable. »
languages.original_text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them glimpses of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."

traits.locale_text: « Les croyez-vous aveugles ? Ils voient plus loin que vous. À travers les reflets de miroirs bénis par les énergies de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, la Lame de l'Aube leur révèle des visions d'une véritable existence et leur donne un aperçu de ce qui adviendra. Les yeux mentent... Nos anciens maîtres leur avaient appris à ne voir que ce qui correspondait aux mensonges dont ils nous abreuvaient. Le don que nous leur faisons est celui de la vision véritable. »

languages.text: “你觉得他们瞎了吗？他们可比你看到的要多。破晓锋刃通过受{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}能量祝福的镜子反射的光，向他们揭示了真实与未来的一督。眼睛会说谎，我们曾经的主人奴役我们，让我们的眼睛只能看到符合谎言的一切。而现在，我们会赐予眼睛真实的洞见。”
languages.original_text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them glimpses of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."

traits.locale_text: “你觉得他们瞎了吗？他们可比你看到的要多。破晓锋刃通过受{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}能量祝福的镜子反射的光，向他们揭示了真实与未来的一督。眼睛会说谎，我们曾经的主人奴役我们，让我们的眼睛只能看到符合谎言的一切。而现在，我们会赐予眼睛真实的洞见。”

languages.text: 「彼らが盲目だと思うか？貴様よりはるかに多くのものを見ている。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}のエネルギーに祝福された鏡の反射を通して、暁の刃が彼らに真の姿のビジョンを見せ、これから起こることの微かな光を授ける。目は嘘をつく。我々の以前の主は、彼らが吐く嘘と同じものだけを見るように教えていた。我らがが授ける贈り物は真のビジョンだ」
languages.original_text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them glimpses of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らを目が見えないと思うか？貴様よりはるかに多くのものを見ている。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}のエネルギーに祝福された鏡の反射を通して、暁の刃が彼らに真の姿のビジョンを見せ、これから起こることの微かな光を授ける。目は嘘をつく。我々の以前の主は、彼らが吐く嘘と同じものだけを見るように教えていた。私達が授ける贈り物は真のビジョンだ」

languages.text: «¿Crees que son ciegos? Ven mucho más que tú. A través de reflejos en espejos bendecidos por las energías del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}, el Filo del Amanecer les revela visiones de la verdadera existencia y les muestra brevemente lo que está por venir. Los ojos mienten: nuestros antiguos señores les habían enseñado a ver solo lo que coincidía con las mentiras que cuentan. El regalo que hacemos es el de la verdadera visión».
languages.original_text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them glimpses of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."

traits.locale_text: «¿Crees que son ciegos? Ven mucho más que tú. A través de reflejos en espejos bendecidos por las energías del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}, el Filo del Amanecer les revela visiones de la verdadera existencia y les muestra brevemente lo que está por venir. Los ojos mienten: nuestros antiguos dueños les habían enseñado a ver solo lo que coincidía con las mentiras que contaban. El regalo que hacemos es el de la verdadera visión».

languages.text: "Sahiden onları kör mü sanıyorsun? Senden kat kat fazlasını görüyorlar. Tan Vakti, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar'ın{/g} enerjisiyle kutsanmış aynalar vasıtasıyla onlara, gerçek varoluşa ilişkin görülerin yanı sıra gelmekte olana dair kesitler de gösteriyor. Gözler yalancıdır. Kadim ustalarımız, onlara yalnızca söyledikleri yalanlarla tutarlı olan şeyleri görmeyi öğretti. Bahşettiğimiz armağan, hakikat görüsünün ta kendisi."
languages.original_text: "Do you think they are blind? They see far more than you do. Through reflections in mirrors blessed by the energies of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, the Edge of Daybreak reveals to them visions of true existence and gives them glimpses of what is to come. The eyes lie: our erstwhile masters have taught them to see only what is consistent with the lies they tell. The gift we give is that of true sight."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten kör olduklarını mı düşünüyorsun? Senden daha fazlasını görüyorlar. Tan Vakti, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar{/g}'ın enerjisiyle kutsanmış aynalar aracılığıyla onlara, gerçek varoluşa dair görülerin yanı sıra gelmekte olana dair kesitler gösteriyor. Gözler yalancıdır. Kadim ustalarımız, onlara yalnızca söyledikleri yalanlarla tutarlı olan şeyleri görmeyi öğretti. Bahşettiğimiz armağan, hakikat görüsünün ta kendisi."
